notesStmt.note: Stained, with slightly ragged edges. A short horizontal tear runs through the middle of both leaves where the paper had been folded; vertical fold is ripped on the bottom half of the double folio. One column per page; 12 lines on pages 1 and 2; 11 lines on pages 3 and 4. No scoring: lines are not consistently straight or parallel. No marginal notes: relatively straight, right margin measures .6 - .8 cm; uneven, left margin is 0.0 - 1.4 cm. Upper margin is .8 - 1.0 cm; lower margin, .8 - 1.6 cm. Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

history.provenance: University of Pennsylvania Museum, Ellen W. Harrison Collection Purchased from Prof. Moritz of Cairo through W.M. Muller, 1910.
